meanings.definition: A unit of time equal to one septillionth of a second.
meanings.sent1: She measured the speed of light in yoctoseconds during her experiment.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used yoctoseconds to calculate the precise timing of the event.
meanings.sent3: It took him a couple of yoctoseconds to realize he had forgotten his keys.
meanings.sent4: The yoctoseconds felt like eternity as she waited for the test results.
meanings.sent5: The yoctoseconds ticked by slowly as he anxiously awaited the phone call.

meanings.definition: The smallest unit of time in the International System of Units.
meanings.sent1: The stopwatch measured time in yoctoseconds, capturing every tiny moment.
meanings.sent2: In the world of physics, yoctoseconds are crucial for precise measurements.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he could finish his homework in a couple of yoctoseconds.
meanings.sent4: The yoctoseconds flew by as she immersed herself in the fascinating experiment.
meanings.sent5: Every yoctosecond counted as the race car sped towards the finish line.
